app_description.message: Open Access Helper will help you identify legal open access copies of academic articles, using unpaywall.org, core.ac.uk, etc.
app_description.description: The Description of the App, as it will be shown within the Extension Menu of Chrome

options_settings.description: translation for the word settings in title

options_page_subtitle.message: - I am excited you've found this extension

options_intro_001.message: Please take a moment to adjust the below settings to match your expected extension behavior. Don't worry, if you change your mind, you can reach this page by right-clicking the extension icon and selecting options, or clicking the settings link within the extension popup. Want to learn more? There is a video tutorial or oahelper.org.

options_intro_002.message: If you find utility in this extension please tell others, leave a positive review or simply enjoy it! If you don't like it, or have ideas as to how to make it better, please tell me, before you tell others!

options_intro_003.description: Apology for translation not needed for EN, DE, NL and FR

options_button_save_settings.description: Button: Save Settings (shown very bottom of page)

options_button_search.description: Button: Search (Shown next to the institute search)

options_button_instupdate.description: Button: Update Settings (Shown next to the institute search)

options_h2_additional_sources.description: Settings Section Label: Additional Open Access Sources

options_h2_nobadge.description: This option will hide the padges

options_link_learn_more.description: Learn more... Link (shown at end of each setting section intro

options_settings_intro_001.message: Open Access Helper is built around the unpaywall.org API. Even the best service sadly cannot find all the Open Access copies, thus you can enable core.ac.uk API and/or Open Access Button request options to expand the reach of this extension.
options_settings_intro_001.description: Section Intro for Additional Open Access Sources

options_settings_intro_002.message: Find similar articles to the one you are viewing, based on textual analysis or citations.

options_settings_intro_003.message: Found a concept or phrase you want to investigate further? Select the concept/phrase, right-click and send it to an academic search engine of your choice.

options_settings_intro_004.message: Sometimes, all that's left is to use your Institutional Subscription. If your institution uses EZProxy or OpenAthens, you might be able to benefit from remote access. If your institution has provided us with the URL of their Link Resolver or Document Delivery Form, you'll be able to request access

options_settings_intro_005.message: If you would like Open Access Helper to be as "invisible" as possible, you can hide all badges on the page. If you elect to do this, please watch out for color changes of the Open Access Helper icon.

options_settings_label_001.description: Check Box Label for core.ac.uk Open Access Options

options_settings_label_002.description: Check Box Label for show open access button

options_settings_label_003.description: Check Box Label for use core.ac.uk recommender

options_settings_label_004.description: Check Box Label for Show Citation Count

options_settings_label_005.description: Disable this feature, shown in Select & Search drop down

options_settings_label_006.description: Check Box Label for Enable EZProxy Support

options_settings_label_007.message: Hide all badges from host page
options_settings_label_007.description: Check Box Label for hide all badges from host page

options_settings_label_008.description: Check Box Label for ask your library (will enabled ILL or OpenURL)

options_settings_label_009.description: Check Box Label for EBSCO user choice

options_settings_label_010.description: Check Box Label for Retraction Watch Data

options_institute_search_placeholder.description: Placeholder Text, shown inside search for for Institutions

options_institute_search_bydomain.description: Next to radio button - search by domain

options_institute_search_byname.description: Next to radio button - search by name

options_options_saved.message: Your settings were saved
options_options_saved.descriptin: Shows Option Saved Message for a few seconds

options_options_proxy_saved.message: Your institutional data for $id$ $name$ was saved.
options_options_proxy_saved.description: Save Proxy Option saved, shows for a few seconds

options_multi_institutes.message: Kindly check your search - multiple institutes found
options_multi_institutes.descriptin: Shows Option Saved Message for a few seconds

options_no_institutes.message: Unfortunately there were no hits - please contact support, so we can help you setup your institute!
options_no_institutes.descriptin: Shows Option Saved Message for a few seconds

options_error_institutes.message: Unfortunately an error occurred :(
options_error_institutes.descriptin: Shows Option Saved Message for a few seconds

options_proxy_searchtooshort.message: Please enter at least 5 characters
options_proxy_searchtooshort.descriptin: Shows Option Saved Message for a few seconds

options_settings_managed_info.message:
For your information:
Your organization manages this installation of Open Access Helper and has pre-selected your institution to ensure you have the best experience possible. You can manage all other settings on your own.
options_settings_managed_info.description: Informing a user that the institute was pre-selected by their organization

popup_configuration.description: Word: Settings - links to option page, shown in footer of page

popup_support.description: Word: Support - takes users to support page

popup_hidebadge.description: Word: Hide Badges - links to option page, shown in footer of page

popup_oabutton_001.message: We didn't find an Open Access copy :(
popup_oabutton_001.description: Open Access Group of text and button, when Open Access Button shown

popup_oabutton_002.message: We found an Open Access copy!
popup_oabutton_002.description: Open Access Group of text and button, when unpaywall.org or core.ac.uk found

popup_oabutton_003.message: We didn't find an Open Access copy :(
popup_oabutton_003.description: Open Access Group of text and button, when ILL form shown

popup_oabutton_004.description: Open Access Group of text and button, when ILL form shown

popup_oabutton_005.description: Open Access Group of text and button, when ILL form shown

popup_oabutton_006.message: You are at the Open Access Copy!
popup_oabutton_006.description: Open Access Group of text and button, when unpaywall.org or core.ac.uk found

popup_oabutton_007.message: Your institution's subscription:

popup_oabutton_008.message: Retraction Watch reported this paper as:

popup_citationbutton_001.message: See who cited this paper:
popup_citationbutton_001.description: Times Cited Group of text and button

popup_proxybutton_001.description: Proxy resource group of text and button

popup_empty_responses.message:
Open Access Helper could not find a relevant service and thus is inactive. Consider changing your Settings or if you think this is a mistake, please report a bug!

Click here to see an example.
popup_empty_responses.example: Shown when no data was found in the page

popup_empty_responses_proxied.message:
You are browsing with the library's proxy server or are at a library website!

Open Access Helper could not find additional relevant services and thus is inactive.

Click here to see an example.
popup_empty_responses_proxied.example: Shown when no data was found in the page, but you are proxied

popup_non_http_source.message: Open Access Helper will only function on websites that start with http and https

content_corerecom_001.message: We didn't find a legal Open Access Version, but you could try and review some CORE Open Access Recommendations instead

content_corerecom_002.message: We found a short list of fresh papers similar to the one you are currently browsing. We hope you'll like them!

content_corerecom_003.message: We were hopeful, but there were no recommendations :( This will automatically dismiss in a few seconds.

content_corerecom_004.message: We are preparing a list of fresh papers similar to what you are looking for. Hang on tight :)
content_corerecom_004.description: shown while recommendation is being requested

content_corerecom_ratelimit.message: Unfortunately we've hit a core.ac.uk Rate Limit - please try again in a few moments
content_corerecom_ratelimit.description: shown when core recommender hits rate limit

content_oab_001.message: We didn't find a legal Open Access Version, but you could try and request it via Open Access Button.
content_oab_001.description: title value shown, when user hovers over the blue Open Access Button 'button'

content_ill_001.message: We didn't find a legal Open Access Version, but you could try and request it via your Library.
content_ill_001.description: title value shown, when user hovers over the blue Open Access Button 'button'

content_ill_002.description: title value shown, when user hovers over the blue Open Access Button 'button'

content_console_001.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): found this DOI ($id$): $doi$

content_console_002.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): support for $provider$ is experimental

content_console_003.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): This document is offered in full-text at this location (EBSCOhost)

content_console_004.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): found this Open Access URL ($source$): $url$ $oaversion$

content_console_005.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): Open Access Button not possible, as there was an error obtaining pub data

content_console_006.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): Open Access Button not possible, as Pub Year > 5 years ago

content_console_007.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): did not find any Open Access, but you can try to request from Open Access Button

content_console_008.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): we are on a DSPACE respository - there is a chance the document is available here

content_console_009.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): no Open Access Found

content_console_010.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): did not find any Open Access, but you can review some CORE Open Access Recommendations

content_console_011.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): There were no recommendations, removing info

content_console_012.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): no Open Access Found

content_console_013.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): We are checking: $host$ with a web scraper
content_console_013.description: Console Log for checking specific publishers

content_console_014.message: Open Access Helper (Chrome Extension): This article was cited $count$ times, according to OpenCitations.net
content_console_014.description: Console Log for checking specific publishers

content_onoa_001.message: This is the Open Access location!

options1_settings.description: Settings Label for the Debug Settings Page

options1_page_subtitle.message: - Please handle these settings with care

options1_intro_001.message: Settings on this page aren't meant for general use. If you found this page, please handle these settings with care and / or be certain to note the original settings, so that you can easily reset things

options1_settings_intro_001.message: This setting is designed to help you debug the extension, please don't use this for prolonged times, as the debug is rather verbose and thus might 'flood' your Browser Console with superfluous messages

options1_settings_label_001.description: add console log output for debug

options1_h2_proxy.description: Section Heading for Custom Proxy Setup

options1_settings_intro_002.message: If your institution's Proxy Server is not listed, we would suggest you contact us, so we can set it up for you. However, if you would like to test your own setup, feel free to provide a name and the login URL (up to ?url= or ?qurl=)

options1_label_illurl.message: URL of your Link Resolver / Request Form

options1_proxy_empty_error.message: You need to provide both a name AND a url, please.
options1_proxy_empty_error.description: name or url is empty warning

context_search_label.description: the label "search" will be concatencated with service like so: Search _SERVICENAME_:

context_titute_search_label.description: Label for highlight & search when local library is selected as target

ebsco_open_soon.message: We'll open your document in a moment
ebsco_open_soon.description: will shown on the host page to indicate link will be opened soon

ebsco_open_fail.message: Sorry, there was an error. Please reload the page and try again!
ebsco_open_fail.description: will shown on the host page to indicate link could not be exchanged

ebsco_access.descriptin: the text shown when hovering over the EBSCO access badge
